title: SMC_SetSoftwareLimits (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_SetSoftwareLimits
Sets the position limits and the corresponding error reaction of an axis.
If the axis is used in the context of coordinated motion, the corresponding
axis group has to be reenabled in order to take into account
the new limits for coordinated motion computations.
Note
The effective error deceleration is the maximum of the configured
maximum deceleration of the axis, the value of
SWL_Error_Deceleration
, and
the value derived from
SWL_Error_MaxDistance
and the current velocity.
(
SWL_Error_MaxDistance
is only taken into account if the value is positive.)

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment:
Rising edge: Rising edge: Starts the execution of the
function block. Applies the Changes.

rows:
